mapper.select: select comment_num, (select user_id from users where user_num = writer_num) writer_id, comment_content from comments where post_num = #{postNum};
select comment_num, user_id, comment_content from comments inner join users on writer_num = user_num where comment_num = #{commentNum};
mapper.insert: insert into comments (post_num, writer_num, comment_content) values(#{postNum}, #{writerNum}, '${commentContent}');
mapper.update: update comments set comment_content='${commentContent}' where comment_num = #{commentNum}
